definition: to rein in/to compel/to force/to carve/to engrave/(literary) to command/to lead/bridle/(physics) abbr. for 勒克斯[le4 ke4 si1], lux

sentences.english: Basil will lose its freshness and shape if you place it in the refrigerator.
sentences.chinese: 罗勒如果放冰箱里，会变得不新鲜，而且还会走形。

sentences.english: Who doesn't love fresh basil in the summer?
sentences.chinese: 夏季谁会不喜欢清新的罗勒呢？

sentences.english: Tomato, mozzerella, basil, olive tepanade drizzle.
sentences.chinese: 蕃茄，奶汁食品，罗勒，青果碎。

sentences.english: Stir in basil. Spoon curry over rice. Serve.
sentences.chinese: 拌入罗勒叶，把咖喱浇在饭上即可。

sentences.english: Turmeric and sweet basil are commonly used Ayurvedic herbs.
sentences.chinese: 姜黄和罗勒都是常用的阿育吠陀草药。

sentences.english: The analysis testing on basic nutrient components of ocimum basilicum was carried on.
sentences.chinese: 对罗勒的基本营养成分进行了较为全面的分析测定。

sentences.english: Combine basil with feta and tomato and you've got a winning combination.
sentences.chinese: 把罗勒和乳酪，小西红柿混合在一起，就大功告成了。

sentences.english: Basil came from Italy. Onions came from Europe.
sentences.chinese: 马铃薯源于墨西哥，罗勒来自意大利，洋葱来自欧洲。

sentences.english: Rip all the basil over it, correct the seasoning, and drizzle with good extra-virgin olive oil.
sentences.chinese: 加入撕碎的罗勒，调味，最后淋上特级橄榄油。

sentences.english: If the basil grows excessively , you can trim it back making your own pesto.
sentences.chinese: 如果罗勒长得过多，你可以修剪下一些来做香蒜沙司。

sentences.english: I put them in a planter with some basil and a few marigolds.
sentences.chinese: 我在与一些罗勒和一些金盏花种植它们。

sentences.english: Stir in the basil; season to taste with salt and pepper.
sentences.chinese: 加入罗勒，调味盐和胡椒。

sentences.english: Breeders in the Charolles vicinity established a herd book in 1882.
sentences.chinese: 在沙罗勒附近饲养员在1882年建立了一个群书。

sentences.english: Sauteing onions and garlic will create a great aroma for Thai basil chicken.
sentences.chinese: 煸葱，蒜将创建一个伟大的泰国罗勒鸡肉香味。

sentences.english: Herbs such as basil help reduce the pain and other symptoms of Chron's Disease.
sentences.chinese: 如罗勒香草帮助减少专栏病的疼痛和其他症状。

sentences.english: Want dry parsley, oregano, basil, or another herb?
sentences.chinese: 想要干燥欧芹，牛至，罗勒，或其它药草？

definition: aromatic herb/vanilla/alternative name for Eupatorium fortunei/(fig.) loyal and dependable person (old)
